Controller

Class GestureController.P

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.GestureController.P
  • Enclosing class:
    GestureController

    private class GestureController.P
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to hold various information about joins and relation to each other and the other actions in sequence. Creates as a class because it is easier to work with and expand as needed
    Author:
    Levi Lindsley

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) boolean C
      Determines if this action is concurrent with the action directly after it

      SimpleOpenNI constant for a joint

      Set to the previous appearance of ( JointOne, JointTwo )
      (package private) java.lang.Integer X
      X relationship between JointTwo and JointOne
      (package private) java.lang.Integer Y

      (package private) java.lang.Integer Z

      • GestureController.P

        GestureController.P(int J1,
                   int J2,
                   java.lang.Integer x,
                   java.lang.Integer y,
                   java.lang.Integer z,
                   boolean conn)
        The constructor called by Gesturecontroller.addPoint();
        Parameters:
        J1 - : SimpleOpenNI constant for a joint
        J2 - : SimpleOpenNI constant for a joint
        x - : x relationship between J2 and J1
        y - : y relationship between J2 and J1
        z - : z relationship between J2 and J1
        conn - : Is this concurrent with the next action in sequence, should not be true for last action

    • Method Detail

      • setPrev

        void setPrev(int p)
        Sets the previous value this is found after the JointOne and JointTwo are know so it is called after the constructor but could be inclueded in the constructor at a later time.
        Parameters:
        p - : The value to set previous to

      • equalJoints

        public boolean equalJoints(GestureController.P o)
        Determines if two instances have the same Joint locations used for finding the previous value
        Parameters:
        o - : Another P class to compare to
        Returns:
        True if BOTH joints in this and o are equivilant
